QueryResult.text: SELECT CMN_SEC_USERS.ID USER_ID, CMN_SEC_USERS.LAST_NAME, CMN_SEC_USERS.FIRST_NAME, CMN_SEC_USERS.EMAIL_ADDRESS, CMN_SEC_USERS.DESCRIPTION, SRM_CONTACTS.PHONE_WORK, SRM_CONTACTS.JOB_TITLE, SRM_CONTACTS.ADDRESS1, SRM_CONTACTS.ADDRESS2, SRM_CONTACTS.ADDRESS3, SRM_CONTACTS.CITY, SRM_CONTACTS.STATE_PROVINCE, SRM_CONTACTS.POSTAL_CODE, SRM_CONTACTS.PHONE_HOME, SRM_CONTACTS.PHONE_CELL, SRM_CONTACTS.PHONE_FAX, SRM_CONTACTS.PHONE_PAGER, SRM_CONTACTS.URL, '' COUNTRY_NAME, CMN_LANGUAGES.LANGUAGE_CODE, SRM_COMPANIES.COMPANY_NAME FROM CMN_SEC_USERS, SRM_COMPANIES, SRM_CONTACTS, CMN_LANGUAGES WHERE SRM_COMPANIES.ID (+)= CMN_SEC_USERS.COMPANY_ID AND SRM_CONTACTS.PRINCIPAL_ID (+)= CMN_SEC_USERS.ID AND SRM_CONTACTS.PRINCIPAL_TYPE (+)= 'USERS'
